title: Indian-Americans furious over US state assembly's open support for Sikh independent state 'Khalistan' within India - The Tribune India
content: Indian-Americans furious over US state assembly's open support for Sikh independent state 'Khalistan' within India  The Tribune IndiaView Full coverage on Google News
description: Washington, May 3 Indian Americans have expressed outrage over a citation issued by the general assembly of the US state of Connecticut recognising an anniversary of the so-called “declaration of Sikh independence”.
